label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_001
content:
## 2026-01-03 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 18500 req | p50: 18ms p95: 44.1ms p99: N/A | err: 0.1% (19 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS 42 req | p50: 612ms p95: 1440ms p99: N/A | err: 4.8% (2 errors) | success: 95.2%
- /ixfr-request: REQUESTS 188 req | p50: 612ms p95: 1440ms p99: N/A | err: 1.1% (2 errors) | success: 98.9%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS 116 req | p50: N/A | p95: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A | p95: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 38% | Mem 62% | Disk 71% | Conns: N/A | Net: 84/112 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 22% | Mem 49% | Disk 54% | Conns: N/A | Net: 61/75 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 57% | Mem 68% | Disk 46% | Conns: N/A | Net: 95/130 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 44% | Mem 73% | Disk 58% | Conns: N/A | Net: 18/20 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-bind-master-01: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-bind-slave-02: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-cloud-dns-sync-01: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-signer-01: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.3% | Bandwidth: 1.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 18500

### Alerts
- [WARNING] AXFR transfer failures on bind-slave-02: 2 failures
- [INFO] TTL reduction rollout completed for 5 zones
- [WARNING] SOA serial mismatch detected on 3 zones
- [INFO] DNSSEC signer queue backed up after KSK rollover; cleared by worker thread increase

### Deployments & Changes
- Enabled cloud-managed secondary for 12 pilot zones; verified NS sets and SOA serial increments
- Completed TTL reduction for api.example.com records (3600->300) in 5 zones; one rollback due to upstream query volume increase
- Simulated KSK rollover; increased signer worker threads from 4 to 6 to clear signer queue

### Events
- Planned cutover: enabled cloud-managed secondary for 12 pilot zones; verified NS sets and SOA serial increments
- Detected intermittent SOA serial mismatch on 3 zones due to delayed IXFR application on bind-slave-02; forced retransfer using AXFR
- TTL reduction rollout for api.example.com records (3600->300) completed for 5 zones; one rollback after stakeholder flagged increased upstream query volume
- DNSSEC signer queue briefly backed up after KSK rollover simulation; cleared by increasing signer worker threads from 4 to 6

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: R. Patel. 3 pages. 7 tickets. Status: Stable after minor transfer remediation; monitoring propagation and DNSSEC validations
